issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Supports expanding the Affordable Care Act, protecting pre-existing condition coverage, and reducing healthcare costs

issues.title: Climate Change Action
issues.description: Advocates for aggressive climate change mitigation, supports Green New Deal principles, and renewable energy investment

issues.title: Racial Justice
issues.description: Strong supporter of police reform, addressing systemic racism, and promoting economic equity for minority communities

issues.title: Infrastructure Investment
issues.description: Supports comprehensive infrastructure modernization, including transportation, broadband, and urban development projects

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Advocates for comprehensive immigration reform, path to citizenship, and protection for DACA recipients

issues.title: Education Funding
issues.description: Supports increased federal education funding, student debt relief, and expanded access to higher education

issues.title: Social Security Protection
issues.description: Committed to preserving and strengthening Social Security, opposing privatization efforts
